abstract: Assault charges against Rutgers University wide receiver Leonte Carroo are dismissed after woman who had accused him of attacking her after football game refuses to testify.
lead_paragraph: A judge dismissed simple assault charges against Rutgers wide receiver Leonte Carroo, who was accused of attacking a woman after a game.

headline.main: Charges Are Dropped in Rutgers Receiver’s Case
headline.print_headline: Charges Are Dropped in Rutgers Receiver’s Case

snippet: A judge dismissed simple assault charges against Rutgers wide receiver Leonte Carroo, who was accused of attacking a woman after a game.
